item.title: Awaken the Giant Within
item.description: [[Tony Robbins]] Concepts Decisions determine destiny Rewrite pain and pleasure. Direct yourself Quotes sense of contribution, of knowing that we have made a difference in other people’s lives. Man is not the creature of circumstances; circumstances are the creatures of men.” Remember: Success truly is the result of good judgment. Good judgment is the result of experience, and experience is often the result of bad judgment!
